short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your favorite quotes while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to save a quote from a webpage. You can later review your quotes, re-visit the pages on which you found the quotes, and search through your list of quotes by keyword.

HOW TO USE
==========
1. Find some text you want to save
2. Highlight it
3. Right click and select "Save quote"

You can then click on the Quoter icon in your browser to view and edit your quotes.

CHANGELOG
=========

2016/2/3 (1.2.0)
- Fixed issue displaying the date a quote was saved

2015/10/28 (1.1.0)
- Use chrome storage to sync quotes across devices
